description:
This dashboard provides an overview of NetFlow Monitoring for the traffic between your network gear. 

For more information on monitoring on-premise gear with Datadog, check out: 

- Our blog post on [Monitoring Datacenters and network devices with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/datacenter-monitoring-dashboards/)
- Our blog post on [Monitoring network devices with SNMP](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-snmp-with-datadog/)
- Network Device Monitoring [docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/network_performance_monitoring/devices)
title: NetFlow Monitoring

definition.content:
This dashboard provides an overview of NetFlow Monitoring for the traffic between your network gear. 

For more information on monitoring on-premise gear with Datadog, check out: 

- Our blog post on [Monitoring Datacenters and network devices with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/datacenter-monitoring-dashboards/)
- Our blog post on [Monitoring network devices with SNMP](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/monitor-snmp-with-datadog/)
- Network Device Monitoring [docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/network_performance_monitoring/devices)
